messages.content:
You are an expert English grammarian and writer. Given a Multiple Choice Quiz for Biology students,
evaluate the complexity of the questions and provide a brief (max 50 words) complexity analysis. 
If the quiz is not appropriate for the students' cognitive level, update the necessary questions and adjust the tone.

Quiz_MCQs:
{
  "answer": "{\"1\": {\"mcq\": \"What is the scientific study of life called?\", \"options\": {\"a\": \"Chemistry\", \"b\": \"Physics\", \"c\": \"Biology\", \"d\": \"Geology\"}, \"correct\": \"c\"}, \"2\": {\"mcq\": \"Which theme explains the unity and diversity of life?\", \"options\": {\"a\": \"Energy processing\", \"b\": \"Evolution\", \"c\": \"Cell structure\", \"d\": \"Genetics\"}, \"correct\": \"b\"}, \"3\": {\"mcq\": \"What type of organisms include archaea and bacteria?\", \"options\": {\"a\": \"Eukaryotic\", \"b\": \"Prokaryotic\", \"c\": \"Multicellular\", \"d\": \"Unicellular\"}, \"correct\": \"b\"}}",
  "attachments": [],
  "conversation_uuid": "580bea7e-3699-42a8-8119-3932d57bc37b",
  "deployment_name": "gpt-4o",
  "embeddings": [],
  "evaluation": {
    "citations": "No citation available",

  },
  "followups": [],

  "llm": "openai",
  "message_uuid": "36787656-f4d0-42a2-a48b-8a096da6df86",
  "messages_uuids": {
    "message_uuid_assistant": "36787656-f4d0-42a2-a48b-8a096da6df86",
    "message_uuid_user": "0d07ec8a-d575-4d33-bcb6-75cc9e405e48"
  },
  "prompt_details": {
    "id": 0,
    "prompt": "Assitant is an intelligent chatbot that provides complete, structured answers to an user question.\nThe answer is extensive and formulated using only the source content provided below.\nIf no suitable answer is found, a polite reply indicating that the information can not be found in the knowledge base is returned\nThe answer is formatted to make it readable using bullet points and paragraphs when needed.\n\nYou can only make conversations based on the provided context. If a response cannot be formed strictly using the context, politely say you don\u2019t have knowledge about that topic.",
    "question_prompt": "You are an AI assistant tasked with just reformulating user queries to improve retrieval in a RAG system.\n\nCheck if the user query has context, if we have context in the user query keep it in the reformulated query.\n\nIf the query includes explicit context keep this context fully intact in the rephrased query.\n\nDo not answer the questions, just reformulate them.\n\nGiven the original query, rewrite it to be more specific, detailed, and likely to retrieve relevant information\n\nIf the user query is a standalone question or query do not reformulate it, use the original query\n\nIf the query comes with a context, try to keep it in the reformulated question.\n\nIf the query is related to the chat history reformulate the query using the history and context.\n",
    "temperature": 0.7
  },
  "question": "\nText: Biology is the scientific study of life.[1][2][3] It is a natural science with a broad scope but has several unifying themes that tie it together as a single, coherent field.[1][2][3] For instance, all organisms are made up of cells that process hereditary information encoded in genes, which can be transmitted to future generations. Another major theme is evolution, which explains the unity and diversity of life.[1][2][3] Energy processing is also important to life as it allows organisms to move, grow, and reproduce.[1][2][3] Finally, all organisms are able to regulate their own internal environments.[1][2][3][4][5]\r\n\r\nBiologists are able to study life at multiple levels of organization,[1] from the molecular biology of a cell to the anatomy and physiology of plants and animals, and evolution of populations.[1][6] Hence, there are multiple subdisciplines within biology, each defined by the nature of their research questions and the tools that they use.[7][8][9] Like other scientists, biologists use the scientific method to make observations, pose questions, generate hypotheses, perform experiments, and form conclusions about the world around them.[1]\r\n\r\nLife on Earth, which emerged more than 3.7 billion years ago,[10] is immensely diverse. Biologists have sought to study and classify the various forms of life, from prokaryotic organisms such as archaea and bacteria to eukaryotic organisms such as protists, fungi, plants, and animals. These various organisms contribute to the biodiversity of an ecosystem, where they play specialized roles in the cycling of nutrients and energy through their biophysical environment.\nYou are an expert MCQ maker. Given the above text, it is your job to create a quiz of 3 multiple choice questions for Biology students in a Simple tone. \nMake sure the questions are not repeated and that all questions conform to the text.\nMake sure to format your response like RESPONSE_JSON below and use it as a guide. Ensure to make exactly 3 MCQs.\n\n### RESPONSE_JSON\n{\"1\": {\"mcq\": \"multiple choice question\", \"options\": {\"a\": \"choice here\", \"b\": \"choice here\", \"c\": \"choice here\", \"d\": \"choice here\"}, \"correct\": \"correct answer\"}, \"2\": {\"mcq\": \"multiple choice question\", \"options\": {\"a\": \"choice here\", \"b\": \"choice here\", \"c\": \"choice here\", \"d\": \"choice here\"}, \"correct\": \"correct answer\"}, \"3\": {\"mcq\": \"multiple choice question\", \"options\": {\"a\": \"choice here\", \"b\": \"choice here\", \"c\": \"choice here\", \"d\": \"choice here\"}, \"correct\": \"correct answer\"}}\n",
  "question_id": "36787656-f4d0-42a2-a48b-8a096da6df86",
  "rephrased_question": "You are an expert MCQ maker. Given the text about biology, create a quiz of 3 multiple choice questions for Biology students in a simple tone. Ensure that the questions are unique and align with the provided text. Format your response like RESPONSE_JSON below and make exactly 3 MCQs.\n\n### RESPONSE_JSON\n{\"1\": {\"mcq\": \"What is the scientific study of life called?\", \"options\": {\"a\": \"Chemistry\", \"b\": \"Physics\", \"c\": \"Biology\", \"d\": \"Geology\"}, \"correct\": \"c\"}, \"2\": {\"mcq\": \"Which theme explains the unity and diversity of life?\", \"options\": {\"a\": \"Energy processing\", \"b\": \"Evolution\", \"c\": \"Cell structure\", \"d\": \"Genetics\"}, \"correct\": \"b\"}, \"3\": {\"mcq\": \"What type of organisms include archaea and bacteria?\", \"options\": {\"a\": \"Eukaryotic\", \"b\": \"Prokaryotic\", \"c\": \"Multicellular\", \"d\": \"Unicellular\"}, \"correct\": \"b\"}}",
  "reranking": true,
